alert.note: Alert for Clinton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 1:35PM EDT until July 20 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clinton County in south central Michigan... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 134 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ithaca to 7 miles south of Carson City to Gerald R. Ford International Airport, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Johns... Grand Ledge... Elsie... DeWitt... Capital Region Inter... Eureka... Ovid... Fowler... Westphalia... Maple Rapids... Hubbardston... Eagle... Wacousta... Abrams Municipal Air... Bath... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
